title: How to Use Mielle Rosemary Mint Scalp & Hair Strengthening Oil

steps.title: Section your hair and apply 1 tablespoon (15 mL) oil to your scalp.
steps.content: Section your hair and apply 1 tablespoon (15 mL) oil to your scalp. Use hair clips or ties to divide your hair into 4 even sections. [1] X Research source Rub about 1 tablespoon (15 mL) of the Mielle oil into to your scalp between each section. If you have thick hair, part it into 6 or more sections. If you have braids or weaves, work the oil onto your scalp between each section. [2] X Research source To use as a hot oil treatment, drop 3 tablespoons (44 mL) of the oil into a heat-safe bowl. Place the bowl in a larger container filled with hot water for a few minutes. [3] X Research source Test the oil on your wrist to make sure it isn’t too hot, then apply it to your scalp as normal.

steps.title: Massage the oil in with your fingers or a scalp massager.
steps.content: Massage the oil in with your fingers or a scalp massager . Focus on working the oil into your scalp to reap all the benefits from the treatment. [4] X Trustworthy Source Cleveland Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source To treat the rest of your hair (not just your scalp), use your fingers to work the oil all the way down to your ends. [5] X Research source Optionally, apply the oil before straightening your hair for a smooth, sleek look.

steps.title: Leave the oil in for 30 minutes or overnight, then wash it out.
steps.content: Leave the oil in for 30 minutes or overnight, then wash it out. If your hair is straight or gets oily easily, try to leave it in for 30 minutes to an hour. [6] X Research source If your hair is coily, thick, or dry, leave the oil in your hair for a few hours or overnight, then wash it out with shampoo. [7] X Trustworthy Source Cleveland Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source Mielle only advises washing their product out if you’re using it as a split-end treatment. [8] X Research source However, others recommend washing it out after 30 minutes if you have straight or especially oily hair. [9] X Research source Test the oil on a small area of your scalp for an hour to see if it irritates your skin before leaving it on overnight.

steps.title: Apply 1 tablespoon (15 mL) oil to your scalp and comb it through.
steps.content: Apply 1 tablespoon (15 mL) oil to your scalp and comb it through. You can section off your hair using hair ties or use the dropper to apply oil evenly all over your scalp. Use a comb, brush, or your fingers to comb the oil from your scalp to the ends of your hair. [10] X Research source Unless your scalp gets oily easily, you don’t need to shower or rinse your hair afterward while using the oil daily. Many people prefer to wash their hair after a more robust scalp treatment.

steps.title: Apply the oil to your ends and wear a processing cap for 10 minutes.
steps.content: Apply the oil to your ends and wear a processing cap for 10 minutes. Leave the Mielle hair oil in for 10 minutes, then shampoo and condition your hair afterward. Repeat daily or as needed to make the ends of your hair shiny and split-end-free. [11] X Research source If you don’t have a processing cap, tie a plastic grocery bag around your hair instead. If you’re experiencing irritation or burning, stop using this product immediately. [12] X Research source

steps.title: Rosemary hair products can help reduce hair loss or shedding.
steps.content: Rosemary hair products can help reduce hair loss or shedding. They can also help reduce dandruff and stress, which has been shown to turn your hair gray. [13] X Trustworthy Source Cleveland Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source Rosemary essential oil can also be beneficial for all hair types and textures. If you have underlying health or scalp issues, consult your dermatologist before using rosemary hair oil. [14] X Research source For best results, use rosemary oil products daily or 2 to 3 times a week. [15] X Trustworthy Source Cleveland Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source Some studies show it can take up to 6 months to see hair growth and get all the other benefits out of the oil. [16] X Trustworthy Source PubMed Central Journal archive from the U.S. National Institutes of Health Go to source

steps.title: Mielle hair oil contains rosemary, mint, biotin, and other oils.
steps.content: Mielle hair oil contains rosemary, mint, biotin, and other oils. Rosemary is an active ingredient because it can stimulate hair growth , strengthen hair, and improve scalp health. However, this oil also contains peppermint oil to add a fresh scent and invigorate the scalp. The biotin is said to nourish the hair follicles, improving strength and elasticity.
